metadata.dc:description: In the last years the organizations have considered theinformation a resourcewithout value but nowadays the informationis an important resourcewhich is necessary tomanageand distribute on a suitable way. The sanitary organizationscould not be unaware of these events. Nevertheless, the grossinformation would not have enough value and it becomesnecessary to deal with it in a proper way. It means that thegross information has to be processed and distributed takinginto account the necessities of the people to whom it is destined.The Information Systems then appear in the organizationlike essential instruments for them.In this study several factors are exposed: the methodologyof the analysis, the design of a hypothetical informationsystem of Infirmary and also the essential concepts to knowhow this information system works nowadays (AU)
